holidays.title: Be a Kid Again Day
holidays.description: Let out that joyful, innocent kid that’s still deep down there in all of us.

holidays.title: International Town Criers Day
holidays.description: If you think opera singers have the most powerful lungs, these guys may come a close second.

holidays.title: Math 2.0 Day
holidays.description: This Math 2.0 Day, celebrate the wonders created with the combination of math and technology.

holidays.title: National Blueberry Day
holidays.description: Let's celebrate this National Blueberry Day with some fresh and tasty ideas.

holidays.title: National Chocolate with Almonds Day
holidays.description: Celebrating such a heavenly confection negates the guilty part of a guilty pleasure.

holidays.title: National Denise Day
holidays.description: Cheers to all Denises in the world; today is all about you!

holidays.title: National Freezer Pop Day
holidays.description: Let us explore the history of freezer pops and how to best enjoy them.

holidays.title: National Ice Cream Sundae Day
holidays.description: Celebrate the day by pouring all your favorite toppings onto your ice cream sundae.

holidays.title: National Kathryn Day
holidays.description: A special shoutout to every Kathryn in the world. Today we celebrate you!

holidays.title: National Love Your Skin Day
holidays.description: Slather on some of that moisturizer, and don’t forget to apply a helping of that sunscreen. Your skin deserves pampering.

holidays.title: Oneofusismissing Day
holidays.description: Whether you’re reaching out for comfort or offering a shoulder to cry on, you can participate.

holidays.title: SCUD Day
holidays.description: On National Savor the Comic, Unplug the Drama Day, ditch the drama and embrace the humor.

holidays.title: Jaden Smith’s Birthday
holidays.description: Despite the public's doubts, this actor does what he loves while showcasing his many talents.

holidays.title: Kevin Bacon’s Birthday
holidays.description: In honor of his big day, here are some facts you should know about Kevin Bacon.

holidays.title: Penelope Disick’s Birthday
holidays.description: With her charming personality, it’s undeniable that Penelope has a bright future in the entertainment industry!
